trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> must serialize the class member as an encoded SOAP attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 必須將類別成員序列化為編碼的 SOAP 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes, or deserializes, an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>類別屬於一系列屬性可控制如何<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化，或還原序列化，該物件為編碼的 SOAP XML。

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: 所產生的 XML 符合全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件，而 「 簡單物件存取通訊協定 (SOAP) 1.1 」 的第 5 節。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需類似屬性的完整清單，請參閱[屬性，控制編碼 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要序列化的物件做為編碼的 SOAP 訊息，您必須建構<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>以建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>類別。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to a public field to specify that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes the field as an XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>公用欄位來指定<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化為 XML 屬性欄位。

trans-unit.source: You can specify an alternative name of the attribute by setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定指定屬性的替代名稱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> if the attribute must be given a specific XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>如果屬性必須指定特定的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute belongs to a specific XML namespace, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性屬於特定的 XML 命名空間，設定<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)

trans-unit.source: You can use the word `SoapAttribute` in your code instead of the longer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 word`SoapAttribute`取代較長程式碼中<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含數個欄位的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>套用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> when you override the serialization of a class member.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>當您覆寫類別成員的序列化。

trans-unit.source: Create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, set its properties, and set the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>、 設定其屬性，以及集合的物件轉換為<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> that is used to override the serialization of a field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立新<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>，用來覆寫欄位的序列化。

trans-unit.source: After creating a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> and setting its properties, the object is set to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 在建立之後<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>且設定其屬性，此物件設為<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is then added to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> that is used to create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
The name of the XML attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> class using the specified value as the name of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值做為 XML 屬性的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含數個欄位的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>套用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the XML attribute generated by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 產生之 XML 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML attribute.
The default is the member identifier.
Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A> property to specify an XML attribute name when the default value cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A>時無法使用預設值，指定 XML 屬性名稱的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the XML attribute name is invalid as a member identifier, use a valid name for the identifier while setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A> to an invalid name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 XML 屬性名稱做為成員識別項無效，使用時設定的識別項的有效名稱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A>無效的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含數個欄位的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A> property is set for the `Today` field.
Gets or sets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type of the SOAP attribute generated by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 所產生之 SOAP 屬性的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料型別。

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: XML 結構描述資料型別，如全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org ) 文件＜XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes＞所定義。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their.NET equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 XML 結構描述簡單資料類型及其.net 對等用法。

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of <xref:System.Byte> structures, and apply a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: XML 結構描述`base64Binary`和`hexBinary`資料類型使用的陣列<xref:System.Byte>結構，並套用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>與<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"，適當地設定。

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the <xref:System.DateTime> type and apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> set to "date" or "time".
trans-unit.target: XML 結構描述`time`和`date`資料類型，使用<xref:System.DateTime>輸入和套用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>與<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>設為 「 日期 」 或 「 時間 」。

trans-unit.source: For every XML Schema data type that is mapped to a string, apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> with its <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> property set to the XML Schema data type.
trans-unit.target: 對應到字串，每一個 XML 結構描述資料型別，套用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>具有其<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>屬性設定為 XML 結構描述資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Note that this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member.
trans-unit.target: 請注意這不會變更序列化格式，只有該成員的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是區分大小寫，，因此您必須將它設定於其中一個 XML 結構描述資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient then passing it as an XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 將二進位資料做為 XML 項目會更有效率再將它傳遞為 XML 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XML 結構描述資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱 World Wide 協會 (www.w3.org) 文件名為 「 XML 結構描述組件 2:: 資料類型 」。

trans-unit.source: XSD data type
.NET data type
anyURI
base64Binary
Array of <xref:System.Byte> objects
boolean
byte
date
dateTime
decimal
double
ENTITY
ENTITIES
float
gDay
gMonth
gMonthDay
gYear
gYearMonth
hexBinary
Array of <xref:System.Byte> objects
ID
IDREF
IDREFS
int
integer
language
long
Name
NCName
negativeInteger
NMTOKEN
NMTOKENS
normalizedString
nonNegativeInteger
nonPositiveInteger
NOTATION
positiveInteger
QName
duration
string
short
time
token
unsignedByte
unsignedInt
unsignedLong
unsignedShort
The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含數個欄位的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> property is set for the `GroupNumber` and the `Today` fields.
The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the .NET data type.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的 XML 結構描述資料型別無法對應至 .NET 資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 屬性的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: XML 屬性的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification "Namespaces in XML".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>屬性是否符合全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 規格"命名空間中 XML"。

trans-unit.source: To create namespaces that are associated with prefixes, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces> that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立命名空間與前置詞相關聯，您必須建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>，其中包含的命名空間和 XML 文件中使用前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The namespace you set for each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> must match one of the namespaces in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>.
trans-unit.target: 設定每個命名空間<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>必須符合其中一個命名空間中<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates the XML code, it correctly prefixes each attribute name.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>產生的 XML 程式碼中，正確前置詞的每個屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含數個欄位的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property is set for the `GroupName` the field.
